name: Swift and Agile
description: Add 1 inch to this unit’s Move characteristic. In addition, add 1 to Advance and charge rolls made for this unit.

name: Heroic Constitution
description: Add 1 to the Wounds characteristic of one CHARACTER model in this unit.

name: Resilient
description: Roll one D6 each time a CHARACTER model in this unit would lose a wound; on a 6, that wound is not lost.

name: Deadly Charge
description: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of CHARACTER models in this unit in the Fight phase if this unit made a charge move, was charged, or performed a Heroic Intervention this turn.

name: Inspiring Hero
description: Add 1 to the Leadership characteristic of friendly units while they are within 6 inches of a CHARACTER model from this unit. In addition, this unit can perform Heroic Interventions if, after the enemy has made all its charge moves, it is within 6 inches of any enemy units, and it can move up to 6 inches when doing so.

name: Tactical Experience
description: While a CHARACTER model from this unit is on the battlefield, roll one D6 each time you spend a CP to use a Stratagem; on a 6, you immediately regain 1 CP.

name: Unstoppable
description: Add 2 inches to this unit’s Move characteristic. In addition, add 1 to Advance and charge rolls made for this unit.

name: Apex Predator
description: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 when resolving attacks made by MONSTER models in this unit.

name: Thickened Hide
description: Add 1 to saving throws made for MONSTER models in this unit against attacks that have an Armour Penetration characteristic of 0 or -1 (invulnerable saving throws are unaffected).

name: Frenzied
description: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of MONSTER models in this unit in the Fight phase if this unit made a charge move, was charged, or performed a Heroic Intervention this turn.

name: Regenerates
description: MONSTER models in this unit regain 1 lost wound at the start of each of your Command phases.

name: Terrifying
description: Roll two dice when taking a Morale test for an enemy unit within 6 inches of this unit and discard the lowest result (if both dice results are the same, discard either one of them).

name: Enhanced Engines
description: Add 2 inches to this unit’s Move characteristic. In addition, add 1 to Advance and charge rolls made for this unit.

name: Elite Crew
description: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 when resolving attacks made by VEHICLE models in this unit.

name: Improved Shielding
description: Add 1 to saving throws made for VEHICLE models in this unit against attacks that have an Armour Penetration characteristic of 0 or -1 (invulnerable saving throws are unaffected).

name: Armourbane
description: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 when resolving attacks made by VEHICLE models in this unit that target enemy VEHICLE or MONSTER units.

name: Repair Systems
description: VEHICLE models in this unit regain 1 lost wound at the start of each of your Command phases.

name: Blessed Hull
description: Roll one D6 each time a mortal wound is allocated to a VEHICLE model in this unit; on a 5+ that mortal wound is ignored.

name: Fleet of Foot
description: Add 1 inch to this unit’s Move characteristic. In addition, add 1 to Advance and charge rolls made for this unit.

name: Veteran Warriors
description: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 when resolving attacks made by models in this unit.

name: Grizzled
description: Roll one D6 each time a model in this unit would lose a wound; on a 6, that wound is not lost.

name: Headhunters
description: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls made when resolving attacks with models in this unit that target enemy CHARACTER units.

name: Cool-headed
description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests taken for this unit. In addition, if a unit declares this unit as the target of their charge, this unit can fire Overwatch (and will score hits on unmodified rolls of 5+ instead of 6 when doing so).

name: Battle-tested
description: This unit has the Objective Secured ability and can make attacks with ranged weapons while performing an Action without that action failing. Combat Attrition tests taken for this unit are automatically passed while it is within range of an objective marker.
